Text.Name: Item_Fruit
Text.ThingName: ผลไม้อำพัน
Text.Desc: เมื่อกินผลไม้อำพันจะทำให้ไม่รู้สึกหิวและเหนื่อยล้าเป็นเวลาครึ่งวัน ผลไม้นี้เน่าเร็วมากหลังจากถูกเก็บเกี่ยว

Text.Name: Item_LingWater
Text.ThingName: น้ำค้างวิญญาณ
Text.Desc: A drop of dew on Spiritual Grass, rich in life force. It will quickly disperse after being separated from the Spiritual Grass. Consuming it replenishes a lot of stamina, as well as greatly improving body recovery rate for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Item_ZaoHuaYuLu
Text.ThingName: น้ำค้างโชค
Text.Desc: Dew with the power of creation formed on a Spiritual Root. It will quickly disperse after being separated from the Spiritual Root. When consumed, one's วิญญาณบรรพกาล will perish and fall into a state of feign death for 81 days, recovering from all injuries. One's flesh and bones will be completely remolded afterwards, increasing Five Attributes by 20% each, but their ค่าความสำเร็จ is significantly reduced. It can only be taken once by each person. Repeated consumption will cause one's วิญญาณบรรพกาล to be permanently extinguished and disperse into oblivion.

Text.Name: Item_SilverGrit
Text.ThingName: ผงน้ำแข็งคริสตัล
Text.Desc: Mineral powder grinded from Ice Crystal Ore, can be used as medicinal ingredient.

Text.Name: Item_CopperGrit
Text.Desc: Mineral powder grinded from Igneocopper Ore, can be used as medicinal ingredient.

Text.Name: Item_Cinnabar
Text.Desc: This special mineral is commonly used as a medium in alchemy and when drawing talismans.

Text.Name: Item_JinEssence
Text.ThingName: ผลไม้ปราชญ์
Text.Desc: Miraculous medicine of the Metal element, with boisterous พลังชี่ dwelling within it. It is said that the fruit can be found in the Nimbus Ravine of Heavenstep Peak.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Plant
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Plant to cultivate a Spiritual Plant.

Text.Name: Item_MuEssence
Text.ThingName: เถาวัลย์ตะปุ่มตะป่ำ
Text.Desc: Miraculous medicine of the Wood element, with boisterous พลังชี่ dwelling within it. Cannot be consumed directly. It is said that the vine can be found on Mt. Tiger Paw and the Wormwrought Valley of the Wild South.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Plant
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Plant to cultivate a Spiritual Plant.

Text.Name: Item_ShuiEssence
Text.ThingName: ดอกบัวปริซึม
Text.Desc: Miraculous medicine of the Water element, with boisterous พลังชี่ dwelling within it. Cannot be consumed directly. It is said that a ดอกบัวปริซึม can be found in the Five Dragons Pond of Mt. Sunshade.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Plant
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Plant to cultivate a Spiritual Plant.

Text.Name: Item_HuoEssence
Text.ThingName: ผลไม้แดงสด
Text.Desc: Miraculous medicine of the Fire element, with boisterous พลังชี่ dwelling within it. Cannot be consumed directly. It is said that the fruit grows at the Jadestone Cliff of Mt. Shu and in the Blazenest of Great Western Desert.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Plant
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Plant to cultivate a Spiritual Plant.

Text.Name: Item_TuEssence
Text.ThingName: ดินเหลืองสกัด
Text.Desc: Miraculous medicine of the Earth element, with boisterous พลังชี่ dwelling within it. Cannot be consumed directly. It is said that the ดินเหลืองสกัด grows in the Drake Cave of Mt. Kunlun.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Plant
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Plant to cultivate a Spiritual Plant.

Text.Name: Item_LingMuXueJie
Text.Desc: Gelatinous substance extracted from the Spiritual Root when nourished, it can replenish the human body's Stamina directly.

Text.Name: Item_EarthEssence
Text.Desc: Essence of what's deep inside the earth's crust, it is a liquid of milky white appearance and an ingredient that can be used in making various kinds of miraculous elixirs. Consuming it directly replenishes a large amount of Stamina and expands พลังชี่ Reserve, increasing one's ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect of พลังชี่ Reserve expansion. It's said that a spring of ฟลักซ์ดิน can be found on Exultant Isle and in the Gemspring Cave of Mt. Shu.

Text.Name: Item_EarthEssence1
Text.ThingName: ฟลักซ์ชั่วร้าย
Text.Desc: Essence of what's deep inside the earth's crust with a bright red color. Consuming it directly replenishes a large amount of Stamina and expands พลังชี่ Reserve, increasing one's ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด. This substance has weak medicine ebb and can be taken multiple times. However, it will cause negative พลังชี่ to concentrate within, which has a permanent influence on the mind. Consuming it in large quantities greatly affect one's cultivation.

Text.Name: Item_EarthEssence_1
Text.Desc: Cream-like substance formed by coagulated ฟลักซ์ดิน. It can convert one's พลังชี่ into vital essence, decreasing ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด. However, one's primeval lifeforce will be damaged as a result, decreasing Perception, Constitution and Intelligence by 10% each. Only works the first time it's consumed.

Text.Name: Item_EarthEssence1_1
Text.Desc: Cream-like substance formed by coagulated Corrupted Flux. It can convert one's vital essence into พลังชี่, increasing ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด. However, one's primeval lifeforce will be damaged as a result, decreasing Perception, Constitution and Intelligence by 10% each. Can be consumed multiple times.

Text.Name: Item_LifeStream
Text.Desc: Divine spring water said to grant immortality when drunk, it is an ingredient that can be used in making various kinds of miraculous elixirs. Drinking it directly prolongs one's Lifespan by 99 years. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect. It's said that the spring can be found in the Celestial Pool of Mt. Nelumbo.

Text.Name: Item_Ginseng
Text.Desc: Expensive herb that can improve people's natural resilience for 2 hours if consumed directly. It can boost their Foundation building process when consumed by outer disciples, or replenish a small amount of Stamina for inner disciples. Often used as a medicinal ingredient. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect, however.

Text.Name: Item_GanodermaLucidum
Text.Desc: Expensive herb that can prolong one's Lifespan by 3 years if consumed directly. It can boost their Foundation building process when consumed by outer disciples, or replenish a small amount of Stamina for inner disciples. Often used as a medicinal ingredient. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect, however.
Text.Item.FabaoSuffix: Boongiver, เห็ดหลินจือม่วง, Powder, Umbrella

Text.Name: Item_RedGinseng
Text.Desc: The finest of โสม with a crimson red color. It can significantly boost their Foundation Training process when consumed by outer disciples, or replenish a small amount of Stamina for inner disciples. Often used as an elixir ingredient. When consumed directly, it can significantly improve people's natural resilience for 2 hours, and increase ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด by a small amount. But consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_PurpleGanodermaLucidum
Text.ThingName: เห็ดหลินจือม่วง
Text.Desc: The finest of Lingzhi with a purplish red color. It can significantly boost their Foundation Training process when consumed by outer disciples, or replenish a small amount of Stamina for inner disciples. Can be used to make some precious and rare elixirs. It prolong one's Lifespan by 10 years and slightly increase ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด if consumed directly, but consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect.
Text.Item.FabaoSuffix: Boongiver, เห็ดหลินจือม่วง, Powder, Umbrella

Text.Name: Item_SoulPearl
Text.Desc: Inner Core of a Beast, with enormous พลังชี่ of Yin dwelling within it. It is said that the orb can be found in the Deathknell Cave of Mt. Hundred Insects.

Text.Name: Item_MonsterBlood
Text.Desc: Blood of a Beast, with energetic พลังชี่ dwelling within. Even contained in a bottle, it still feels boiling hot. It is said that the Beast blood can be obtained at the Serpent Pit of Mt. Hundred Insects and the Village of Dunes in the Great Western Desert.

Text.Name: Item_Mint
Text.ThingName: ใบพิศุทธิ์
Text.Desc: Common herb of a chilling quality, consuming directly can calm one's spirit and พลังชี่. It also increases Mental State if the taker is an inner disciple.

Text.Name: Item_MagicHerb
Text.Desc: Herb rich in spiritual power, it is of a warm quality and is widely used. Can be utilized along with a variety of other materials to make elixirs.

Text.Name: Item_Ginkgo
Text.Desc: The fruit of a Ginkgo tree, it can be made into various tranquilizing medicines.

Text.Name: Item_SnakeGallbladder
Text.Desc: The gall bladder of a snake, it can replenish a small amount of Stamina or be used as a medicinal ingredient. Swallowing of it by mortals could enhance their body and boost the efficiency of Foundation Training.

Text.Name: Item_BearGallbladder
Text.Desc: The gall bladder of a bear, it can replenish Stamina or be used as a medicinal ingredient. Swallowing of it by mortals could enhance their body and boost the efficiency of Foundation Training.

Text.Name: Item_Healroot
Text.Desc: Common medicinal substance that can be used to treat a variety of illness, but with limited effect.

Text.Name: Item_Hemostatics
Text.Desc: Common medicine that can be used to treat open wounds, having apparent curative effects.

Text.Name: Item_SmallCycle
Text.Desc: Common medicine that can be used to treat visceral injuries, having apparent curative effects.

Text.Name: Item_Plaster
Text.Desc: Common medicine that can be used to treat bone fractures, having apparent curative effects.

Text.Name: Item_StoneEssenceDrug
Text.Desc: Medicinal substance made by combining herbs with ground stone essence. Incredibly effective in treating wounds and illnesses.

Text.Name: Item_Anodyne
Text.Desc: Common medicine that can effectively relieve pain.

Text.Name: Item_Laxative
Text.Desc: Common medicine that accelerates defecation, it can be used to treat symptoms such as Bloating and Dirt Eating. However, the taker of the drug will feel extra weak after its effect wears off.

Text.Name: Item_ThunderAir
Text.Desc: A wisp of tribulation breath stolen by tricking the ways of heaven. There is terrifying power flowing within it.

Text.Name: Item_XianBone
Text.Desc: The remaining bones with divine power after an เซียน's Mortal Body is destroyed. If you are capable of bearing its power and integrate it into your body, you would have assimilated heavenly พลังชี่, significantly reducing your ค่าความสำเร็จ.

Text.Name: Item_XianBoneBall
Text.Desc: The remaining bones with the power of Belief retrieved from destroyed Deity's Body. If you are capable of bearing its power and integrate it into your body, it can significantly increase your Divinity, improve Mental State permanently as well as raising the Max Divine Residents cap. It grants a smaller effect if worn on the body.

Text.Name: Item_ZaoHuaYuZi
Text.Desc: Essence of what's deep inside the Drake Cave of Mt. Kunlun condense into. A very compact substance, it can only be used with a special secret method.

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_None
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the purest essence of Natural Root. Only by cultivating Undefined skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining. Multiple refinements will gradually diminish the effect.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Refinement

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_Jin
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the Natural Root of Metal element. Only by cultivating Metal-type skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining. Multiple refinements will gradually diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_Mu
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the Natural Root of Wood element. Only by cultivating Wood-type skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining. Multiple refinements will gradually diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_Shui
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the Natural Root of Water element. Only by cultivating Water-type skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining. Multiple refinements will gradually diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_Huo
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the Natural Root of Fire element. Only by cultivating Fire-type skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining. Multiple refinements will gradually diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_BenYuan_Tu
Text.Desc: Crystal containing the Natural Root of Earth element. Only by cultivating Earth-type skills can one be able to refine it. Successful refinement reduces ค่าความสำเร็จ, while failure will result in injury and an increase in Condemnation. The higher your ค่าความสำเร็จ, the higher the success rate of refining.

Text.Name: Item_YuanHunLu
Text.Desc: Dew containing the essence of a Beast's soul. Consuming it will slow down one's thought process, repairing damage on วิญญาณบรรพกาล. However, slowing down of thoughts will negatively affect one's mental skills, decreasing Intelligence by 10%.

Text.Name: Item_XieHunLu
Text.Desc: Dew containing the essence of a Beast's soul. Consuming it will accelerate one's thought process for a period of one season, increasing Intelligence by 10% and improving learning abilities. Such an act will overdraw the power of soul, however, causing damage on your วิญญาณบรรพกาล.

Text.Name: Item_YanDaoGuo
Text.Desc: Peculiar fruit containing Heaven's Breath. Consuming it allows one to observe the evolution of the ways of heaven and become one with them in harmony, greatly increasing ค่าความสำเร็จ and greatly decreasing Condemnation.

Text.Name: Item_QieDaoGuo
Text.Desc: Peculiar fruit containing Heaven's Breath. Consuming it allows one to steal from the ways of heaven and consequently become a threat to them, greatly decreasing ค่าความสำเร็จ and greatly increasing Condemnation.

Text.Name: Item_XianDaoShenNian
Text.Desc: A wisp of divine consciousness leaked from the Divine Bones, can be utilized by cultivators to remold their mind and body. Due to the blessing of the เซียน's consciousness, one can retain a small part of one's previous Inspiration upon rebirth. When using this item to rebirth for the first time, one's Potential will be improved as well due to the nourishing of divine consciousness.

Text.Name: Item_XianDaoXieNian
Text.Desc: A wisp of evil consciousness leaked from the เซียน's Remains, can be utilized by cultivators to remold their mind and body. Due to the blessing of the เซียน's consciousness, one could retain most of their previous Inspiration after rebirth. Such a thing is of negative properties, however, causing one to overdraw their Potential when using it to reborn for the first time.

Text.Name: Item_WinterWarm
Text.ThingName: ยาหนอนฤดูหนาว
Text.Desc: The matured form of Caterpillar Fungus in winter. Consumption grant a slight increase in Cold-resistance.

Text.Name: Item_SummerHerb
Text.ThingName: ยาสมุนไพรฤดูร้อน
Text.Desc: The matured form of Caterpillar Fungus in summer. Consumption grant a slight increase in Heat-resistance.

Text.Name: Item_God_ZhiNianJieJing
Text.Desc: Crystallization generated from obsession in human mind, it contains all kinds of intense emotions, desires and miscellaneous thoughts. Effects unknown.
